title: Plan Coverage for a Major Scheduled Event
description: Editors are planning coverage for the upcoming Olympics. They need to coordinate assignments for multiple reporters and photographers.

tasks.description: Create a master planning document or spreadsheet for the event.
tasks.expected_outcome: A central planning document is created.

tasks.description: List all the different events that need to be covered and the deadlines for each.
tasks.expected_outcome: The document contains a comprehensive list of all coverage requirements.

tasks.description: Assign specific reporters and photographers to each event based on their expertise and availability.
tasks.expected_outcome: All events are assigned to a specific team member.
